name: pi-gadgets
description: Simple set of node tools for interacting with some common pi addons

scripts.link: tsc && mkdir -p out/lib && cp package.json out/ && cp -r build/src/* out/lib/ && cd out/ && npm link
scripts.prerelease: rm -rf build/ out/ && tsc && mkdir -p out/lib && cp package.json out/ && cp LICENSE out/ && cp -r build/src/* out/lib/ && npm publish --tag next out/

author: Kyle Carbone
